content: making my crochet gingerbread man pattern is a lot easier than catching him in fact this gingerbread man crochet pattern only takes a few hours to create **materials** ▢bernat super value - topaz ▢red heart yarn - white ▢red heart yarn - cherry red ▢14 mm safety eyes ▢tapestry needle ▢polyfil ▢4 mm hook ▢stitch markers **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease front loop only flo
